PageTitle: display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol p2mp-te
FuncDef: The display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol p2mp-te command displays statistics about P2MP sub-LSPs in the Up state.
CLIs: display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol p2mp-te
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol p2mp-te
Lsr Role       Total     Ingress   Transit   Egress    Bud
Lsp Type       Total     Ingress   Transit   Egress
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol p2mp-te command displays statistics about P2MP TE LSPs in the Up state after P2MP TE is enabled.
The display mpls multicast-lsp protocol p2mp-te command displays information about sub-LSP forwarding entries.
